question.string: Who was vice-president under the president who authorized atomic weapons against Japan during World War II?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"atomic weapons"' 1000). ?proj a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Agent>. ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/vicePresident> ?proj. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Which anti-apartheid activist was born in Mvezo?
Which recipients of the Victoria Cross died in the Battle of Arnhem?
Where did the first man in space die?
Which members of the Wu-Tang Clan took their stage name from a movie?
Which writers had influenced the philosopher that refused a Nobel Prize?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Nobel Prize"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/influencedBy> ?const. ?proj a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Philosopher>. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Who composed the music for the film that depicts the early life of Jane Austin?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"film" AND "Jane Austin"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/composer> ?const. ?const a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Agent>. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Which horses did The Long Fellow ride?
Of the people that died of radiation in Los Alamos, whose death was an accident?
Which building owned by the Bank of America was featured in the TV series MegaStructures?
Which buildings in art deco style did Shreve, Lamb and Harmon design?
Which birds are protected under the National Parks and Wildlife Act?
Which country did the first known photographer of snowflakes come from?
List all the battles commanded by the lover of Cleopatra.
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"lover" AND "Cleopatra"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/battle> ?proj. ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/commander> ?const. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Which actress starring in the TV series Friends owns the production company Coquette Productions?
Gaborone is the capital of which country member of the African Union?
For which movie did the daughter of Francis Ford Coppola receive an Oscar?
At which college did the only American actor that received the César Award study?
In which city does the former main presenter of the Xposé girls live?
Who plays Phileas Fogg in the adaptation of Around the World in 80 Days directed by Buzz Kulik?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"World in 80 Days"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> ?const. ?const a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Agent>. ?proj ?pbridge <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Buzz_Kulik>. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Who is the front man of the band that wrote Coffee & TV?
A landmark of which city is the home of the Mona Lisa?
